title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the response code is 200 OK with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and access a URL, I expect to receive an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL and observe the response
